comment.author: 11418107@N02
23103743@N05
comment._content: Despite her social popularity, she was still Miss Almy Gilford when she married Donald Jones in 1962. She was his third wife. See NYT of April 27, 1962 (subscription needed) query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10711FF3D5C177A9...

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Confirming that detail... she was still Miss Almy Gilford when she was a westbound passenger on the RMS Caronia, boarding at Le Havre on 8 August 1953: www.caronia2.info/plf530808.php

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Well, sounds like she was more popular with her fellow debutantes than with the fellas.
